response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations and increase efficiency. Given its high value and potential impact on your projects, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $10,000, and I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product.", "product_price": 9500}
